apps.localizedDescription: uYou+ is a modified version of uYou (made by @MiRO92) with additional features and mainly made for non jailbroken users!
apps.name: uYou+
apps.subtitle: A tweak for YouTube.
apps.versionDescription:
YouTube v18.14.1.
uYou v3.0: this is a huge update of uYou, the changelog can be found here (should fixed some existing issues of uYou)
uYouPlus:
Removed some tweaks/patches as they have been implemented in uYou 3.0 (YTAutoFullScreen, YTShortsProgressBar, hide Shorts buttons, keychain patching, etc...)
Added YTStockVolumeHUD: replaces YouTube's volume HUD with the stock volume HUD (Video Player Options).
Added an option to disable Double tap to seek (Video Player Options).
Fixed Red Progress bar not working by @dayanch96 (#1082).

apps.localizedDescription:
Yiven is a combined version of uYou and iVanced. It is currently a work in progress.
Please make sure to keep all extensions.
apps.name: yiven
apps.subtitle: Best youtube tweak ever.

news.caption: the first release just came out!
news.title: yiven Now Available!
